column4: Guys I have some problem instazlling the nvidia graphic drivers on my unbuntu
: are you trying to install it with apt-get?
No I'm geting the driver .RUN from the nvidia web site
don't do that!  Install it with the restricted drivers program in ubuntu
goto system -> administration -> restricted drivers manager
I did and I cant use the driver
you need to enable the correct repositeries
I'm enableing the driver and it says that 'is not enabled'
you need to go to System -> administration -> software sources  and enable Proprietray drievers for devices
Then try and enable the driver again
I clicked on the Proprietary drivers for devices (restricted), so what now ?
try and enable the driver again in the restricted drivers again
I got the same error steve_b
I enabled everything on the 'Ubuntu Software' tab on Software sources, and then I could install the restricted driver for my nVidia card...
ah ok Steve_b I will enable all
- one more thing.  If you type my name at the start of the line of text it shows up a different colour and I can see you easier!
It works, I will need to restart I will get back again after restart, thanks
well done!
how do I format a Fat32 drive in linux?
Thank you so much for ur help
no problem mate
